title: Chamizal National Memorial: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News        We are the only park to fly both the US and the Mexican flags at our visitor center. NPS   Â    The Memorial regularly issues news releases to keep visitors informed about upcoming interpretive and education programs, special events, and policy changes. Teachers, parents and students should also check the Education pages for news about education-related events and opportunities. Please refer to the Calendar for current ranger programs and theater events. A link to a monthly printable Cultural Calendar can be found at the bottom of the page. You can also keep informed on our Facebook page where we post park photos and up-to-date event information. You can share with us and others your experiences at Chamizal National Memorial.  Chamizal also maintains a channel on YouTube where we can upload videos. Check us out! For more information and press inquiries, our Public Information Officer is Anne Doherty-Stephan.
